document.full_text: a former portfolio manager at the connecticut hedge fund diamondback capital management has pleaded guilty to fraud and conspiracy, the latest defendant to admit wrongdoing in the government's broad probe into hedge fund insider trading.
document.title: diamondback manager pleads guilty in insider case
lines_and_colors: a former portfolio manager at the connecticut hedge fund diamondback capital management has pleaded guilty to fraud and conspiracy, the latest defendant to admit wrongdoing in the government's broad probe into hedge fund insider trading.
